name: Powers Of the Wild
description:
The Gods have trusted you by giving you their powers to retrieve an ancient artifact that belongs to them. The powers are listed below

1) Ready Legs(Grasshopper):Ability to jump higher.
2) Glue(snail): Secretes glue on a particular object/structure that helps it glue to other objects. (Has to be used by clicking on both the objects that have to be glued)
3) Burrowing(mole): The ability to dig underground. The player can use this to avoid any obstacles
4) Overpower(bear): Ability to have superhuman strength and can be used for Breaking weaker structures.
5) Blindsight (Bat): Uses Echolocation to detect weak structures and hidden objects. 

6) Shrink(Mouse): Ability to shrink the character

Use these powers to solve puzzles and help the gods reclaim their artifact.

Beware of some surprises!!

Contributors

Komatr- UI and SFX

Donedevil - Programming 

Shravan - Game Design(Level Design and Narration)
